headline.main: RUSSIANS REPORT NEW TULA GAINS; RETIRE IN CRIMEA; Nazis Declared Driven Back at 4 Places South of Moscow -- Beaten Off to Northwest

lead_paragraph: BERNE, Switzerland, Friday, Nov. 14 -- Counter-attacking fiercely since dawn yesterday, Russian troops in the Tula region, 110 miles south of Moscow, were reported by the authoritative Soviet military commentator in his regular broadcast this morning to have driven the German back at four points.
abstract: USSR forces in new gains, Tula; withdraw, Crimea; Germans nearing Kerch; USSR planes raid Koenigsberg, East Prussia; German losses severe, Tula zone
